Amazon Logistics Tracking and Driver Complaints - Amazon Customer Service
s: Go to Manage Address Book under Settings and select Change. You can provide information like the address type (Residential or Commercial), intercom number, or a security access code. This information is saved in your Address Book and applied to any future orders that you place to that address.

t: Why does Amazon in the UK think it’s acceptable to leave an expensive item you ordered outside your front door in full view of the street? - Quora
